comments.comment: Finally. Edgar has been so generous allowing his cameraman to get most of the screentime over these last 10 years.
The fact that these two are still around after all these years warms my heart so much. I remember when Felix got Edgar — so crazy how time has flown. I hope all is well over there!
Edgar is actually so big brain that Felix doesn’t realize it. He knows exactly how the treat toy works but he doesn’t want to use all his energy on it so he plays dumb and has felix do it for him
Edgar walking off proudly with a huge slipper in his mouth might be the medication I needed all along to make me feel better. I loved this so much

pewds: "you're so tough, growl"
Edgar: "bird noises"
This is my daily dose of wholesomeness. Just seeing his humble daily life just chilling with doggies makes my heart warm ^^

Didn't realize how emotional seeing an aged Edgar and especially Maya, would make me. Made me tear up a bit, remembering the past decade with your vids. love ya pewds, don't know what I'd be doin without you.

(Edit) Love y'all.
RIP maya you were the best to be around with we and felix will miss you stay strong
Dogs are the exact replica of their owners...

Totally heart warming but also heart jerking seeing mya and Edgar age so well after all these years of watching Felix, I remember mya being a energetic lil pug and edgar fuckin shit up. I love them. Here to so many years and to many more to come !

"I don't want kids, they are too dumb"
"Dogs are also dumb, but I don't care cause they are cute"
-Pewds
The most surprising things for me were: how much bigger Edgar is than Mya, how Pewdiepie cleans their teeth everyday, and how good Edgar looks with a cowboy hat and camo pant things.
The fact we are able enjoy such a chill and wholesome Pewds is the clear sign we've got old and consequently more mature while watching his videos over the years.

Felix is truly his own best fan 
He laughs at his own jokes without even finishing them and you can tell he’s so proud of himself, and I love it
Ever since Jenna Marbles left Social Media its this type of wholesome dog content that I've been craving. Thank you for filling the void, Pewds! I love Edgar and Maya!

Honestly so sad. She literally made my childhood as well especially with the Jabba the Hut song when it first came out which even today is so nostalgic and all the times she would get featured when PewDiePie was in his prime. RIP Maya. Never forgotten and always remembered. Thank you so much for making and being apart of our childhood Maya

PewDiePie: I'm so tired, I won't make videos anymore.
Edga: Don't worry, I will do it for you.
I like how Edgar has mastered the technique of  speaking so clearly without even flinching a single muscle of his mouth
I love the way felix is approaching his content.he seems to enjoy it and I dont feel that stress behind the camera anymore compared to years ago.

I literally was just watching this yesterday and I was shocked to see the news that Maya passed away. I can't imagine the pain marzia and felix are going through now. Rest easy Maya, gone but not forgotten.

I can't believe how emotional this video made me. I remember when they first joined the family and I am not prepared for them to be getting this old. I love them so much!!  I wish i could send them something, I just want to spoil them in their old age
I felt like I was 15 years old again, this video brings a lot of nostalgia and made me feel good for some reason.
The tone of pewds voice is completely different when he talks to his dogs. You can hear it in his voice how much he loves them.

If there's one thing I love as much as your content that makes me laugh, it's yours and Marzia's little family with the pugs. I've been following since you guys first got Maya, and every time you post them it brings me so much joy to see them and you guys living your best lives! Sending you and the pugs so much love always! <3

Seeing Edgar and Miya for the first time when I started watching Pewdiepie around 5 or 6 years ago was one of the main reasons I begged my family to get a pug and that has to be one of the best things I’ve ever done in my whole life. I’m glad Edgar and Miya are both still doing well

My dog is my best friend and we spend almost every hour of every day together. She's not doing so well right now and I'm trying to make the most of the possibly short time I have left with her. Seeing these happy dogs helps me keep a smile on my face for her so she can't see how not well I'm handling it. 
Thank you for helping me give my girl the best I can while I still have the time to do it. I know everyone thinks the same about their pet but she deserves the best she can get. She's put so many smiles on so many people's faces while they were having a bad day not just mine.
I love how Every once in while he makes these super wholesome vids out of nowhere
he's like a father having a great time playing with his two children while the mum is working.
I’ve had my two labs since college, got married, had a son, and they are still with me.This made me hug them extra tight as they lay in bed with us. Dogs are the best for everything.
happy to see maya is still doing well
The Edgar content we deserve
After all these years I sobbed seeing Maya still being obsessed with Edgar’s ears
I just love to think that Felix just uploads whatever videos he enjoys. You can tell how much chill fun he's having with his recent videos after his break

He loves his dogs so much, it's adorable...
Everyone should treat their pets this way ♡

Felix: "It's Edgar day!"
Maya: "Are you sure about that?"

I love it. We've finally hit the chill dog-dad vlog part of his life.
Take it easy, pewds. I hope you're having a great life.
I really don't care what content pewdiepie has i just want to watch him it's feels homey in this channel.
I love how Felix and Marzia always keep the pups engaged and stimulate their minds.
I love how wholesome Pewds is now. Very relaxing content.
Edgar "going pshyco" at night resembles how my dogs get giddy after eating something tasty. I looked it up and apparently that's how dogs celebrate. Warms my heart that he celebrates every night
Such a wholesome and chill content we deserve after a stressful week. Watching them just chilling and enjoying their day is already entertaining and stress relieving. ️
More dog blogs! I love when creators include their pets, I foster and rescue senior dogs and this kind of content is a direct shot of serotonin into my soul. Thank you Pewds.
Edgar and Maya are the most blessed dogs I've ever seen in my life. They're such little sausages
Rest easy maya~ you are so missed by many!

The digging thing Edgar does after peeing is another way of marking, dogs have scent glands on their paws so it doesn't really need to pw right where they peed, but it helps spread their scent over a wider area

Edgar is so adorable!! I do hope we get more of Maya soon too. It's been years since they've been with you and it's a bit sad how much older they look now, nonetheless I hope they continue living long lives
Seeing Pewds and Edgar grow over such a huge span of time makes them feel like family. Such a heartwarming video ️
It brings tears to my eyes seeing how Edgar and Maya changed over the years. Its truly beautiful seeing them still around.
Not gonna lie, this video was a rollercoaster of emotions. Ranged  from wholesome, to tears

Glad to see Maya's permanent winky face again. Never gets old.
Isn't Maya like 16/17? Quite the age for a small dog.
Love the vlog style of videos. Basically when Felix moves around and just talks and shows shit. It's fun.
Rest in Peace, Maya, our Puga-chan. You have brought joy into Felix and Marzia's life and accompanied all of us since almost the beginning. Pass the rainbow bridge and live happily ever after. <3
I had a 14 year old pug that passed away this summer. She was the same way about waking up and kicking after she used the bathroom. This brought back great memories. Thank you for posting.
I’ve always made fun of people following other people’s pets on Instagram but yet I find myself genuinely enjoying watching a dog vlog. I don’t know something about turn tables to finish this off
I would be 100% completely okay if this become a dog vlog channel
RIP Maya, all 111 million of us will miss you greatly

Man, it breaks my heart to know that one day none of this will exist, Edgar, Maya or Pewds but till then I'm gonna enjoy every second of it. Love you Pewds. Part of the Bro army since the last 10 years. ️
Watching PewDiePie hanging around with his dog is just so relaxing and cute.

I love how pewds house looks like normal sized and not a giant ass mansion. I think it's refreshing to see  someone so successful who isn't trying to buy the biggest house around for no reason. It just looks nice and cozy
I almost started crying watching this,  We had to  put are old boy to sleep recently and Edgar reminds me so much of him.
These two pups deserve the entire world.
Alternate title: "Felix gushes over how cute his dogs are for 15 minutes"

Edagr and Maya are literally like human siblings, Edgar is like the younger sibling all active and jealous when Maya gets the snuggies and Maya is just the older one, too chill to care about the world and just wants to eat sleep and make fun of the younger one. Btw great video pewds i smiled all the way :>
The voice pewdiepie puts on for Edgar is so funny, thank u Felix for being so chill, kind hearted, and funny.

Love the doggy vlogs - I share my world with a little black pug, so it’s always lovely to see, little Edgar especially, as they are very similar. The puggy personalities and all their cute little quirks never fail to make me smile  so Pewds, Eggy and Maya, thanks for sharing
A whole video dedicated to Edgar just existing, how perfect. It’s his world and we just live in it
Never realized it would be Pewds giving us the Jenna Marbles genuine content we miss and need
I cried at 6 am this morning finding out Maya passed. May she rest in peace and hope she knew or had a little feeling that she was very loved not just by her owners but by some people in the world.
Edgar once again makes the content that this site doesn't deserve, but we need. Also, props to his camera man, and his editor.
By the title I thought it was going to be an edited video of Felix doing his Edgar voice and voice over what he does in a day. This is just as equally cute and loved watching this

I never relaterd to those comments saying Pewds made their day during hospital admittance or something different. 
Been watching since ‘12, and now I can finally say: THANK YOU PEWDS for making my dag during the time my father is hospitalized. So wholesome, gratz to Edgar
I love the thing that pewdiepie talks to his dogs in Sweedish its just so cool

I like the glimpse into their everyday life and surroundings. Marzia's cursed objects everywhere, the fact that they sleep in a loft overlooking the living room/dining room. Seeing other people's setup/house and life has always been something I enjoy. It's a very simple, happy life.

P.S. I'm new-ish to the channel.
It never ceases to amaze me how much smaller Maya is than Edgar. she's such a soft potat and Edgar is a precious bean.
Days were made everywhere as well as hearts being warmed! This video is too good for this world . Thanks Felix, Marzia, Maya and Edgar.
Never been this sad because of a dog's departure. Rest well, Maya.
8:53 That shot of Edgar is so adorable. Those big round eyes <3
I remember thinking about how stinkin’ cute Maya was when I first saw her, like a little derp of a pug. And she still is! Like a gentle little old lady.
Great to see Maya and Edgar. This vid gave me strong Marzia vibes. Calming and nostalgic. ^_^
I have a pug and i can confirm 100% this is exactly what it is like to live with one, theyre so precious <3

I can't believe imma be one of the "I literally teared up watching this" kind of guy, but it did happen, I was really feeling down today and I decided to watch this video to stop myself from being sad, the second-hand happiness that I got from this video really overwhelmed me, thank you and happy edgar day
So glad we got to see Maya again. For some reason I felt like I was neglecting her

It's insane to have seen Edgar grow all these years, and watching Maya age along from being a spunky little lady. The whole reason I love pugs so much are these two cuties. Thank you for making their lives amazing.
i love how there is this specific laugh for when we’re with our pets but especially dogs, pure entertainment and cute-ness

Dude im 23 now ive got out of the Marine Corps recently and coming back from time to time to watch felix makes me feel old i see how old maya is and realize i was like probably 9 when i started watching felix dude what happened time has gone by so fast i wish i could get a chance to see him someday just have a chat i feel like it would be like talking to a older brother,

I did not expect to be sad and devastated by someone else’s dog, but well, here I am 

Rest in peace maya, were gonna miss you buddy
RIP Maya. I am so glad that you lived happily with Pewds. You will be missed.
I’m so happy that Maya is doing okay it’s been so long since I last saw her️

This video hits hard. I really appreciate how much love and care you give your Edgar and his sister. We had our puppy babygirl for 17 and a half years and she passed away yesterday before you put this video out. I had to pause several times to cry as it made so many memories flood back. Thank you and God bless you sir.

The noises he makes make me happy. :]
Thank you for sharing this video, especially with the commentary in the back in the beginning. 
I relate with Maya at the start, I too wake up slowly.

It breaks my heart to know that she is no longer with us 

RIP Maya
These are always my favorite,,, just,,, chill and pets. It makes me so happy to see how healthy they are and how loved! Im so glad they have marzia and pewds!!!
this was the cutest video I've seen all week ^^

"We want you to live a long, happy life Edgar."
"There is no happiness in dentistry, fool. Release me."
But seriously, the cuteness overload from this. :D

This video made me cry a lot not because of sadness but because of what it means to touch someone's heart specially when you are having it rough. 
Time overwhelms, emotions surface, reminiscence of the past and memories of the future. A true nostalgia and a heart that breaks before the innocence and the pure love of a pet, a friend, a dog that was imprinted on us and makes us remember how truly beautiful (utsukushi) life is with them.
i really respect how edgar is collabing with small creators like pewdiepie...
14:10 That is the face of someone who has grown to love the taste of human flesh. Good boy Edgar
9:45 when the owner is buff, so is the dog LMAO

Maya really did bring peace to my heart everytime I see in videos or photos
R.I.P our beloved Maya
i like this different types of videos pewds is doing i hope he keeps it up!
